meanings.definition: Not planned or arranged in advance.
meanings.sent1: The unscheduled meeting caught everyone by surprise.
meanings.sent2: The unscheduled visit from the neighbor was a pleasant surprise.
meanings.sent3: The unscheduled rain shower ruined our picnic plans.
meanings.sent4: The unscheduled power outage left the neighborhood in darkness.
meanings.sent5: The unscheduled fireworks display lit up the night sky unexpectedly.

meanings.definition: Not following a set timetable or schedule.
meanings.sent1: The unscheduled bus arrived late, causing confusion.
meanings.sent2: Her unscheduled breaks at work made her day more flexible.
meanings.sent3: The unscheduled dance party in the office was a hilarious chaos.
meanings.sent4: The unscheduled detour took us through scenic countryside.
meanings.sent5: The unscheduled train delay made everyone impatient on the platform.
